content.question: Which of the following will be the most likely consequence from the daily operation of a typical hydroelectric power plant?

choices.label: Greenhouse gases will be released during the generation of electricity.
The frequency of floods will increase downstream of the hydroelectric dam project.
Beach erosion will increase where the river meets the ocean downstream from the hydroelectric dam project.
The population of fish that migrate to areas upstream of the hydroelectric dam project to breed will increase.

content.answer: Beach erosion will increase where the river meets the ocean downstream from the hydroelectric dam project.

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
